LanguageData.Throne.description: A large, ornate chair designed for a dignity-focused mage to sit and meditate. Reigning on a throne is a form of meditation that builds up mana. For dignity mages, more impressive meditation thrones and thronerooms increase the rate of mana gain.
LanguageData.GrandThrone.description: A massive, ornate chair, designed for dignity-focused mages to sit and meditate. Reigning on a throne is a form of meditation that builds up mana. For dignity mages, more impressive meditation thrones and thronerooms increase the rate of mana gain.
